forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog between 3am and 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the sun peeks through the marine layer, illuminating a landscape that remains crisp and cool as the day unfurls. Currently, the city benefits from mostly sunny skies, with temperatures hovering in the early 60s. However, don’t be fooled by the brightness; as the afternoon beckons, you can expect a gentle drop, giving way to an inviting coolness. The air carries a whisper of the coast, with a light southwest breeze stirring at about 5 to 10 miles per hour, offering a refreshing lift to the day.

As evening approaches, the weather hints at a shift, with patchy fog expected to greet the early hours of the night. The cloud cover will weave itself around the city, bringing a hush to the bustling streets, with temperatures dipping to around 50 degrees. Best to dress in layers today—perhaps a comfortable sweater under a light jacket, perfect for those uncertain transitions from sunlit strolls to cooler twilight moments. It’s an ideal time to enjoy a peaceful walk by the waterfront or savor a quiet afternoon spent in a café, with a book or a thoughtful conversation serving as companions while the fog rolls in. Today’s mellow vibes encourage simple pleasures, allowing you to embrace the beauty of San Francisco’s unique character amidst the ever-changing weather.
